name: Ricochet Round Up
description:
Top-down bouncy ball action!

Bound balls into goals on all 13 levels!

Includes an infinite play mode for tons of level combinations and a Versus mode for two local players on 3 separate maps!

this game was made for a personal game making challenge and will take most players around 20 minutes to beat.

and infinite minutes in infinite play and versus is loads of fun.
